    def init_http_ssl(http)
      if @ssl_init_http
        @ssl_init_http.call(self, http)
      else
        # enable SSL for this HTTP connection
        http.use_ssl = true

        if @ssl_verify
          # set the verify mode and the cert store
          http.verify_mode = @ssl_verify_mode
          http.cert_store = @ssl_store
        end
      end
    end
